description: Enables the GCM channel for an application or updates the status and settings of the GCM channel for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

parameters.name: GCMChannelRequest
parameters.description: Specifies the status and settings of the GCM channel for an application. This channel enables Amazon Pinpoint to send push notifications through the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM), formerly Google Cloud Messaging (GCM), service. ApiKey (string) --- The Web API Key, also referred to as an API_KEY or server key, that you received from Google to communicate with Google services. DefaultAuthenticationMethod (string) --- The default authentication method used for GCM. Values are either 'TOKEN' or 'KEY'. Defaults to 'KEY'. Enabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether to enable the GCM channel for the application. ServiceJson (string) --- The contents of the JSON file provided by Google during registration in order to generate an access token for authentication. For more information see Migrate from legacy FCM APIs to HTTP v1.

nested_params.name: ApiKey
nested_params.description: The Web API Key, also referred to as an API_KEY or server key, that you received from Google to communicate with Google services.

nested_params.name: DefaultAuthenticationMethod
nested_params.description: The default authentication method used for GCM. Values are either 'TOKEN' or 'KEY'. Defaults to 'KEY'.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether to enable the GCM channel for the application.

nested_params.name: ServiceJson
nested_params.description: The contents of the JSON file provided by Google during registration in order to generate an access token for authentication. For more information see Migrate from legacy FCM APIs to HTTP v1.

nested_items.name: GCMChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the GCM channel for an application. The GCM channel enables Amazon Pinpoint to send push notifications through the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM), formerly Google Cloud Messaging (GCM), service.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the GCM channel applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the GCM channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: Credential
nested_items.description: The Web API Key, also referred to as an API_KEY or server key, that you received from Google to communicate with Google services.

nested_items.name: DefaultAuthenticationMethod
nested_items.description: The default authentication method used for GCM. Values are either 'TOKEN' or 'KEY'. Defaults to 'KEY'.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the GCM channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: HasFcmServiceCredentials
nested_items.description: Returns true if the JSON file provided by Google during registration process was used in the ServiceJson field of the request.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the GCM channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the GCM channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the GCM channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the GCM channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the GCM channel, this value is GCM.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the GCM channel.
